|wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Wireless_N_Router |default_ssid_regex=^Wireless_N_Router$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=C8:3A:35 |oui_eth=C8:3A:35 }} {{TagLine|Wireless 802.11N Router w/ Internal Antenna and WPS Function - 2T2R MIMO (300Mbps)}}
[http://www.monopricehub.com/files/manuals/8742_Manual_120807.pdf Manual] ([http://web.archive.org/web/20140224022751/http://www.monopricehub.com/files/manuals/8742_Manual_120807.pdf also via ''archive.org'']) "10009992", "V3.0", and a lead-free logo is silkscreened on the board in the images below. While the FCC ID on the unit's label is '''V7TW368R''', this is in error (for at least the unit shown in this entry, for some units it may be correct). That FCC ID was for the RT3052 based W368Rs.. The manual provided by '''Monoprice''' states the default wireless PSK is '''12345678'''.. and that it can only be changed to another 8 character string. ==Images== ===Stock images=== Image:Monoprice_8742_1.jpg|side, angled Image:Monoprice_8742_2.jpg|angled Image:Monoprice_8742_3.jpg|back, ports Image:Monoprice_8742_4.jpg|power adapter [[Has images::external| ]] ===m86's unit=== File:Monoprice_MW368R_unit_bot.JPG|the unit's bottom File:Monoprice_MW368R_unit_back.JPG|the unit's back File:Monoprice_MW368R_power_supply_label.JPG|the power supply {{#set:Has images=label}} File:Monoprice_MW368R_board_top_1.JPG|board top, 1 File:Monoprice_MW368R_board_top_2.JPG|board top, 2 File:Monoprice_MW368R_board_top_3.JPG|board top, 3 File:Monoprice_MW368R_BCM5357C0.JPG|BCM5357C0 WiSoC File:Monoprice_MW368R_Flash_and_TPs.JPG|Flash + test points File:Monoprice_MW368R_TPs_2.JPG|test points + SoC File:Monoprice_MW368R_over_left.JPG|over the left side File:Monoprice_MW368R_angled_back_left.JPG|angled, back left File:Monoprice_MW368R_angled_front_left.JPG|angled, front left File:Monoprice_MW368R_angled_inner_left.JPG|angled, inner left File:Monoprice_MW368R_angled_left.JPG|angled, left File:Monoprice_MW368R_ant_1.JPG|one antenna File:Monoprice_MW368R_ant_2.JPG|and the other one File:Monoprice_MW368R_board_bot.JPG|board bottom {{#set:Has images=internal}} ==Used PSU(s)== The power adapter shown above is a '''Shenzhen Heweishun Network Technology Co., Ltd.''' TEA09U-09100. {{hasPowerSupply |brand=Shenzhen Heweishun Network Technology |model=TEA09U-09100 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.3 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=9 |output_a=1 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |e_level=5 |manuf_country=China |style=small, horiz. }}
